1.title: Gender

choices: Domestic - Cats, Dogs, Hamsters, Parakeets, etc.
11.content:
You jumped at the chance to get a free pet. Figured a nice dog or a cat would be welcome company, you always were a pet person. When you got to the store you were surprised to see that it was the size of a mega department store. However when you walked in it was only a plain room with a few doors a clerk behind a desk. no animals in sight.
"First time here?" the clerk smiled.
"Um, yeah. I got this letter in the mail and..."
"I gotcha. Lemme explain something real quick. Our 'pets' are really anthropomorphic creatures, half human and half animal. So you're not just here for a pet you are also getting a real companion and a friend. Possibly even more if you wish, and it's not as weird as it sounds. Honestly I can't count how many times I've seen love at first sight working here."
"Okay we have several areas, designed to imitate the various habitats the animals the 'pets' would come from. So how about you pick one and we can start looking around?"
11.title: More Than Just Pets

1122.content:
"Follow me." You follow the man through the store. In the past few minutes you had seen a savanna with several lions and a female gazelle anthro, then a forest habitat with several fox anthros, both male and female trod along as you passed by.

"Oh yeah, one more thing. It might be best if you adopt both tigresses. They're sisters and are always with each other. They would do nicely if you owned both rather than just one of them." You regarded his statement well, after all you wanted your pet or possibly pets to like you. Not long after you and the man finally reached a large grassy forest area of sorts. The man stops by the door and blows several sharp whistles. The forest seemed to go quiet for the moment. Before long several soft steps where heard before two tigers came out. Make that tigresses. You blush slightly but couldn't help but stare with lust. "All right then take your pick. But keep in mind what I said earlier," the man said.

They both towered over you to a ridiculous extent, the alpha in particular. "The alpha's Skylar, and her uh... 'little' sister is Amber. Guess why they have those names," he smirked. Skylar was quite unique. Her stripes were a sky blue color and black instead of orange and black, which was quite beautiful. Her eyes too were also sky blue and beautiful. Her hair was also a wonderful mix of midnight blue and black. She easily stood at 8 foot tall, and you nearly got a creek in your neck looking up so high. Her 'little' sister was not at all little, being around 7 foot 6 inches but was clearly shorter than her sister. Her fur was orange and black with jet black hair. But her distinguishing feature was that while Skylar's eyes shined, Amber's eyes also glowed beneath her fringe, and were gorgeous. Apart from that they looked the same physically; full supermodel figures with E-cup breasts and ridiculously long legs. You were only just above Skylar's in length. Despite the hourglass figures they also had bodybuilder physiques, with steely abs and biceps. They had perfect behinds as well and frankly were desirable in every way.

The clerk briefly put you out of your trance and asked who you wanted. "I'll take...

11223.content:
"Can I take both of them home?" you asked the clerk, looking at him sigh in relief. "Of course you can. Just follow me and I'll give you the paperwork." The sisters beamed with joy as Skylar lifted you into a big hug while Amber stroked your head. Clearly they seemed to approve of their new owner. Thank fuck, it would have been pretty unnerving if they didn't. Skylar however continued holding you as she followed the clerk to the reception. Her striped fur was just about the softest thing you ever felt, and you could assume the same with her sister. It was strange though considering their abs, although you weren't complaining. She let you down though once you reached the reception and you realized that you were pretty high up while she was holding you.

The clerk showed you the paperwork and all you had to do was sign at the bottom to be the owner of the two gorgeous felines who towered behind you, their shadow filling some length. Eagerly you signed the paperwork. "Alright then, now all you have to do is put these collars on them." The clerk handed you two specially made collars with Skylar emblazoned on one and Amber on the other. Skylar had to kneel down for this but it was still quite a stretch while you only just managed to put Amber's on as she bent over. They had to put on hoodies as they left as the shop didn't like too much publicity.

When they got home they straight away took off their going out clothes, again revealing their incredible figures and wagging tails. They then looked and you and finally spoke. "So Master, where will we sleep?" Skylar asked you in a deep, sexy but feminine voice. "I assume on the sofa or on the floor Master?" Amber then asked in a slightly less deep voice, but still quite deep. Instead you simply replied by opening the door to your bedroom, with a quite massive sized bed and room for about ten. "How about in my bed with me?" you asked only to receive approving nods and a warm hug from each of them. "Well it's getting late now, I'm gonna go to sleep now." You got into your bed in your underwear while Skylar and Amber got in on either side of you wearing nothing but their fur, holding you in place between their warm, luscious bodies. "Thank you for taking me in Master. I love you, goodnight," they said to you in unison before wrapping their arms around you. "I love you too girls. Goodnight." And so you fell asleep in their warm, furry embrace

At your answer the clerk guides you to an area of the farm which was basically a large pasture. Your eyes were immediately drawn to a herd of about a dozen or so anthropomorphic horses of various shapes, sizes, and colors.

1131.title: Horse

11311.content:
You look at the mare that caught your eye, though in hindsight its hard for her not to. She towers over the rest of the herd, and you of course. But what did you expect of a Clydesdale? Her fur was a soft dapple brown with a dark mane and tail but her arms, feet (hooves?) and a stipe on her face was white. Feeling you looking at her she turns catching your eye with her huge brown ones.

A smile appears across her face and she walks over clearing the distance in a few steps. "Howdy there partner." She greets her voice holding a country twang that you are not sure is natural or forced. "Names Daisy. Pleasure ta meet ya." She says smiling and extending hand. On instinct you extend your own, and try not to yelp in pain as she shakes your hand. Girl had a grip!

Now that she was closer you got a good look at her. The first thing you notice was, again, just how big she is, everywhere. She easily has a foot, maybe two feet in height on you and is wider as well with broad shoulders. That also includes her muscles which you can now see are clearly defined. From toned legs and defined arms this mare didn't seem to have an inch of excess fat on her. "She must work out a lot." You realize "Or is just naturally strong." She wore a, fittingly enough, "Daisy Duke" outfit that disn't seem to do much. The faded blue checkered shirt barely held in her bountiful chest, easily a F cup if not bigger, and her wide toned hips and seemed like they would split her "skirt" open at the first misstep. In all a amazon beauty

The thought makes you blush and you turn away realizing that you've been staring. Instead of being angry though the mare just chuckles. "Like what ya see sugar?" She asks in a teasing tone. You nod slowly making her laugh again and give you a friendly pat on the back, which almost makes you fall over. "I think I like you sugar. So you thinking of taking me home?"

She asked with a teasing tone and a confident smile, but you could hear the desperate hope in her voice and the worry in her eyes. You think about it for a moment wondering what to do.

"Since the creatures of myth are more rare, were keep them in a mix of habitats, besides dragons we also have gryphons, phoenixes, kobolds, and more"
As you follow, the clerk leads you up a mountain till you come across a hot spring. "Wait, Is there a volc-"
"Oh no," The clerk interrupts you, "That'll to be to dangerous, We have a heating system to heat the water and a lot of other things going on here."
You look back and you see three dragonesses, a black one in a bra sunbathing on a rock. "No thank you." Well that ruined your chances of picking Night or Spark, Snow looks nice but you want to see this Scarlet.

That bit of info was put aside as you got a good look at Scarlet, and you could see why Spark and Night picked on her. Scarlet was plump! She wasn’t fat, or even necessary overweight, she was just big!

While the other three looked slim and toned Scarlet was heavyset and curvy. She was wearing a simple white shirt which billowed loosely around her, hiding most of her figure but doing nothing to hide the bounce of her large breasts, or the way her body curved in all the right ways. And you realize, your heart sinking, Scarlets large figure was probably the perfect target for Night and Spark. Scarlet also lives up to her name, her scales being a rich crimson, with two horns on her head that were a light gold, almost the same color as her eyes.

The big dragoness gripped her shirt nervously looking at you with golden eyes filled with hesitation as her tail swings back and forth nervously as you continue to look her over. “Um, hi.” She finally manages after a moment snapping you out of your trance.

“Hi!” You manage smiling warmly up at her, a gesture her hesitantly returns. A silence descends on you and Scarlet after that: Scarlet seemingly unwilling to speak up as she continues to fidget nervously and you trying to get over the shock that you are speaking to a real live dragon.

1223312.content:
“Impressive isn’t it?” Come on, there’s plenty to pick from further in,” said the clerk showing you around
Dragging you away from the main entrance, the clerk quickly brought you down a narrow, dirt trail.
“So, what sort of species are in this area actually?” you asked nervously
“All sorts! There are foxes, lions, squirrels, raccoons, bears...”
“Bears?!”
The clerk simply hummed in agreement. “Don’t worry, they’re very friendly once you get to know them.”
Sure, the idea of a big fluffy bear sounded appealing, but the idea of something being that dangerous left you feeling unnerved. What if someone like a bear was too much? So instead, you decided to play it safe. But at the same time, you wanted someone exotic, uncommon. With that mind, you put your best foot forward, and politely asked...“Got any skunk girls?”
The clerk gave you a look. “You sure sir? A skunk?”
“Well yeah, why not? Is there something wrong with them?”
The clerk waved his hands. “No, no! It’s not the girls that I’m concerned about. It’s just, you know, they’re skunk girls. They’re not exactly most people’s first choice if you know what I’m saying,”
You gave the clerk an un-amused look. “Why? Do they smell? Do they even spray?”
The clerk titled his head uneasily. “Not really, no. I mean, they can, but it’s actually a really small amount of spray and the smell barely lasts. Normal human body odor is probably worse...”
You gave the clerk a smile. “Well that solves the problem then! So who do you have?”
“Well that’s a bit of a problem sir, since skunk’s aren’t requested often, there aren’t many of them on the premises.”
Your heart sank a little. “Are there any skunk’s here then?”
“There is one skunk girl off the top of my head, but she’s a bit, you know...” The clerk made a circle gesture with his hands around his stomach, a rather LARGE circle.
“Fat you mean?” you said bluntly “I don’t mind if that’s the case, I prefer heavy girls as a matter of fact.”
“Calling this skunk girl ‘Fat’, is putting it politely sir...” The clerk said plainly. “But if you insist, wait right here sir, she normally hangs out just around the hill, I’ll be right back!”
Before you could even reply, the clerk pulled away and hurriedly sprinted across the field before disappearing out of sight. Footsteps to your left soon caught your attention. Calling her “heavy” was an understatement. The clerk was right, she was HUGE. Standing at about your height, but easily three times that in width, was a skunk girl whose belly was bigger than an exercise ball that reached several feet out in front and a little down below her waistline as it poked out from underneath her shirt. Her breasts wer watermelon size, while her arms were thick and flabby underneath jet black fur with a snow white stripes that trailed down her back. But the most impressive part of her was her lower region, her hips and thighs were wide, sharp, and thick as any strong oak tree. And with an ass that easily stretched several feet outwards behind her that jiggled and wobbled with each step she took. You had a feeling no matter how hard you tried, there was no way you would be able to wrap both of your arms around a pair of hips and ass that big. Behind that, she possessed a large, bushy black tail with white stripes that when raised to its full height, towered above her head. Dressed in a dark green shirt with a pair of faded, light blue jeans that were in danger of ripping, you couldn’t help but notice how beautiful she was. Eyes that were a stunning blue that spoke of intelligence; long perfectly combed and pampered chocolate brown hair that flowed down to her shoulders showed she put care into herself. Even her face, which was round, soft and padded with fat, seemed cute and gentle to your eyes. So enraptured were you by her looks you hadn’t noticed when she had finished walking, (mostly waddling), up to you with the clerk alongside.
"Here she is, may I introduce Penelope" said the clerk.
“So you’re the one asking about me?” the beautiful skunk girl asked..
“I..umm, well...I...” you stuttered.
“A bit tongue tied are you?” her eyes scanning over you with a look that was unmistakably unimpressed.
“Be nice Penelope,” the clerk warned, “Give the guy a chance,”
The skunk sighed, “Don’t waste your breath salesman, there are far better choices here than me..."
“Don’t I get to be the judge of that?” you quickly replied.
The skunk girl gave a look of surprise.
"And why would you want me?" she asked you hotly.
“Always liked skunks actually, I think they’re quite adorable,”
"Perhaps, but I doubt you came here to choose a tub of lard like myself..."
“And perhaps I like that sort of thing....”
This caught the skunk by surprise, but her wide eyed expression gave way to a devious one, one that sent shivers down your spine.
“Oh, so you,” she began, patting her large, soft stomach, “Enjoy this?”
You swallowed again and nodded slowly, your brain suffering too big of a short circuit to form a proper response. This seemed to please Penelope even more, as she started sauntering her way over to you ever so slowly. Stopping only when her massive belly was but a few inches from touching you
“You prefer your girls big huh?” she asked huskily, drawing closer to your face as she raised herself up on her tip toes.
“Bigger the better,” you said with a squeak.
Her breath was warm and soothing on your skin. Your hands clenched tightly with sweat and shaky nerves, itching desperately to reach out and try to wrap your arms around her thick waist and pull her up against yourself.
“Hmm” she hummed in thought.
Penelope said nothing else as she turned to walk a few paces away. Giving you another look at her wide ass as it jiggled with every step in her too tight jeans.
“Sooooo......” you began
“So?” she replied, looking over her shoulder. Her large, bushy tail swishing back and forth, seemingly awaiting your answer.
“So, would you like to come with me?”
Penelope tapped her pudgy chin in thought, cocking one thick hip out to the side
“Sure, this probably won’t work out, but at least I might have some fun while I can,”
“Oh, oh, well that’s great!”
Penelope crossed her thick arms and gave you a firm look. “Easy tiger, I just said I’ve decided to try living with you. Not to warm your bed.”
“Umm, right, of course, I wasn’t expecting anything else. Other than perhaps we can become...friends?” you asked carefully, holding out your hand.
The beautiful, hefty skunk girl glanced at your hand once before rolling her eyes. But to your inner delight, she gave you a small smile as she took your hand in hers. “Friends, at least, or die trying.” She said.
“Hopefully it won’t have to come to that,” you quipped.
“We’ll see about that. I might be too much ‘fun’ for you to handle,” she said cheekily.
A warm feeling of happiness bloomed inside your heart as Penelope took your hand to shake it. Her fur felt so soft, so gentle, it made your skin tingle with excitement. As if on cue, a familiar voice piped up to ruin the touching scene the two of you were having.
“Excellent! Seems you two are getting along quite well, come with me to the front office and we’ll sort out Penny’s paper work.” The clerk declared.
Ten minutes later, you were back in the front entrance bent over the main desk signing away ownership papers. Penelope had left moments before to pack a small bag filled with a few clothes, toiletries, and a few personal keepsakes. You wee almost done with the paperwork when something caught your eye.
“Income enhancement?”
The clerk nodded. “For taking ownership of Penelope, the store will provide a living budget for you while she is in your care,”
“What for?” you asked innocently.
“You will need that with Penelope, the girl has an appetite fit for a whale, unless you prefer to go grocery shopping every evening. She also bursts through clothes pretty quickly, so you unless you want to...”
“No, I think I’ll take all the help I can get,” You laughed uneasily
“Sir, can I just say, thank you for this,”
“Huh?” Y
“Penelope has been here awhile, and mostly because previous owners have returned her before.” The clerk explained sadly. “Customers would bring her back for whatever lame ass excuse they could conceive: Too expensive, overeating, no good with strangers, no longer tolerate the smell and so on. She was always on the large side, but some of the caretakers believe the hurt of being brought back has only worsened her eating habits, the poor girl, she can’t win no matter what she does,”
Putting the final touch on the last document, you handed the clerk the thick pile of papers with a confident smile on your face.
"Don't worry, I will care and look after her like the queen I know she is,"
“Glad to hear that sir,” the clerk said with a grin.
A door opening from behind revealed a sight that made your heart flutter. The large skunk was dressed in a reddish pink blouse with white pants that were once again, both straining to contain all of her girth. By her side were two medium sized suitcases on wheels.
“Alright, paperwork is all done, and the store will bring your stuff around in about a week or so. Have a nice day and good luck to the two of you!"
Thanking the clerk for all he did, you quickly packed the bags away into the trunk before helping Penelope to literally squeeze herself into the back of your car. Even with the seats rolled all the way back, she still seemed cramped.
“So, where are we going first?” she asked you with a hint of eagerness to her voice.
“How about...” You began to say
1223312.title: Heavy and Plump (Fat and Curvy)

You respond to Penelope "Well why don't we go visit the town"
All of a sudden he got real excited. "Are we going to get something to eat"
"Well sure"
"But first we have to,

info.brief_description: An invitation to a special pet store
info.description:
A story inspired by Anthro Pet Shop, and a spiritual successor to my previous story Macro Furry Pets, but more size appropriated. You have an invitation to a new and unique pet store, but these are not your normal pets. These 'pets' are anthropomorphic creatures that want you to take them home.

Some small rules:
- They are part human, which means they have the general form and behavior of humans, therefore they are capable of speech, as well as animal characteristics; these are people, not freaks or monsters.
- The pets will be scaled according to their animal counterpart, so a mouse anthro will be small and petite, but still human sized, while a dinosaur anthro (those are allowed) will be closer to ten feet tall or taller.
- No graphic violence.
- Sex and other explicit content is permitted.
- NO killing anyone or anything.
- Please have the chapters make sense.
- The pet will age in human years so to keep it all tidy.
- All animals, extinct or mythological, are allowed.
- No Digimon/Pokemon
- Pets in the shop are divided by habitat, i.e. domestic, swamp, forest, farm, prehistoric
- No scat or watersports.
- Since giant anthros will occur, this does not mean there will be vore/unbirth/anal vore. Stick to relativly normal physiology
- If you choose a male character, the animals will be female. If you choose a female character, the animals will be male.
- Please keep the anatomical structure the same as a human's i.e female dogs should NOT have eight breasts. Frankly it's just not right.

Please add and have fun!
